recipes.name: Souvlaki skewers
steps: Marinate halloumi, courgette, pepper, onion etc in oil, half lemon jouce, oregano, sumac, garlic and allspice
Thread onto skewers and grill for 7 minutes on each side
Serve with humous, tzatziki, flat bread and salad

recipes.name: Pasta norma
steps: Cut an aubergine into 2cm cubes. Salt and leave in colander for 30 mins then roast for 20 mins
Fry garlic and mix with tin of plum tomatoes and some basil
Cook for 20 to 30 minutes to thicken
Mix with paste and grate 25g per person ricotta salata or feta over the top with basil

recipes.name: Asparagus risotto
steps: Fry a couple of shallots in butter
Keep adding vegetable stock until risotto is cooked
